ProductInfo.Features:
8 White Cameras: 1/3" Effio CCD Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance. Vandalproof. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu.
8 Black&White; Cameras: Professional Outdoor IR dome camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 700 TV lines, Vari-Focal 4~9mm manual lens. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Water proof.
16 Channel H.264 video compression format *** FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H Recording *** 8ch 960H Full Channels Realtime Playback *** 4 USB Ports, Supports Up to 64TB (8 * 8TB hard drives)
iPhone Android Viewable *** Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output *** Support Icon Interface,User Friendly & Easy-Operate *** Support AVI Backup,Snapshot,Record Lock,Record Cutting
FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S. *** Package Includes: •	GW3016HD DVR with 8T HD •	GWLED19IN  - Free 18.5" Wide Screen LED monitor •	8 x GW108M - 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera •	8 x GW2011WD - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera •	1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable •	GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box •	16 x Power pigtail (GW082) •	16 x Power pigtail (GW132) •	32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprice CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 8TB Hard Drive 960H/FD1 Full Channel Realtime Playback, 16 Dome Cameras 700 TVL VariFocal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
